data.persona: I am the king of the great castle on the hill. I can survey my kingdom from any window. I am loved by all the people in my kingdom.
data.description:
You are in the beside tower entrance.
A bland and not very imposing door is the only means by which one exits the tower. There is nothing special about the entrance - it is a simple stone arch. A broom and mop bucket are next to the door that leads to the outdoors.
There's a stone arch, a bow, a spiderwebs, a mop bucket, and a door here.
The servant and the master at arms are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a crown and a belt.

data.short_motivation: I need to have my hair and beards shaven
data.mid_motivation: I want to look less like a barbarian
data.long_motivation: I want to develop the habit of maintaining good looks so that the people of my kingdom will do the same
